name: Blood+ One Night Kiss
description: Set in the fictional town of Shikishi, most of the game is played from the perspective of Saya Otonashi, with occasional stints as Kou Aoyama, an original character created for One Night Kiss. Saya and the other characters are battling the Chiropterans, bat-like monsters. The Moon is a recurring symbol, used in the opening cutscene and during loading screens, fitting with the series' vampiric inspirations as well as the game's artistic similarities to killer7.
